text: Costoanachis sparsa is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off French Guiana. ==References== * Pelorce J. , 2017. Les Columbellidae (Gastropoda: Neogastropoda) de la Guyane française. Xenophora Taxonomy 14: 4-21 ==External links== * Category:Columbellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1859
title: Costoanachis sparsa
